metamodel.description:
Check this to generate workflow models on leading frameworks.
This Workflow Metamodel allows to model Business processes.
SIDE provides the modeler to graphically produce workflow models and various generators to instantiate these models on leading frameworks.
metamodel.name: KSR600 Workflow

technology.description: Generate documentation (in opendocument) for the models of the metamodel.
technology.name: OpenDocument

option.documentation: if enabled generator add model screenShoot
option.label: includes screen shoots
